QuestData.Title: In Search of the Ruby Lilac
QuestData.Description: How fortuitous it is that the Ruby Dragonshrine lays just to the east. It is there that you will find a flower called the ruby lilac. This lifegiving plant is all that I need to concoct a vaccine for the untainted beasts of this region.$B$BTravel east and search the Ruby Dragonshrine for the lilac.$B$BJust one thing: The dragonshrine, like all the dragonshrines in this blasted wasteland, is beset by the Scourge. Watch your step. We wouldn't want you to be devoured by an emberwyrm.$B$B<Sintar laughs.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Doctor Sintar Malefious at Agmar's Hammer in the Dragonblight wants you to collect 1 Ruby Lilac.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the ruby lilac?
QuestData.RewardText: That wasn't so difficult, now was it?$B$BNow give me a moment to prepare the vaccine.
